title: Fairness Artificial Intelligence in Clinical Decision Support: Mitigating Effect of Health Disparity
details: H Wu, Y Zhu, W Shi, L Tong, MD Wang - … EMBS International Conference on Biomedical and …
abstract: The United States, as well as the global community, experiences health disparities among socially disadvantaged populations. These disparities often manifest in the data utilized for AI model training. Without appropriate de-biasing strategies, models …
